website_summaries.verdict: Roll up the front panel on this cover for easy viewing.
pros: Waterproof cover made from 400D heavy-duty polyester
Soft cotton-like synthetic liner protects screen from scratches
Bottom flap secures with hook-and-loop tape
Protects against wind, rain, snow, dust, mildew, mold, and other elements
Roll up front cover for viewing
cons: Some find the pocket to be too thick for newer flat panel TVs
Difficult to fit around some wall mounts

customer_reviews.title: Perfecting the outdoor TV cover
customer_reviews.text: Finally someone has put major thought into perfecting the outdoor TV cover. Great 360 degree protection for my TCL 65" TV without taking off the cover. Besides zipping shut on both sides, the cover has Velcro to seal the bottom and back to seal the wall mount and cable entry. Also, has a pocket to seal the remote. The cover has enough room in the rear to extend protection when pulled from the wall (as seen in picture). My TV cable box was able to fit under the cover and zip tie to the wall mount hanger. Very pleased with the A1Cover outdoor TV cover. DaveM, Friendswood TX.
customer_reviews.author: DaveM

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely completely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed with this TV cover. I purchased a relatively inexpensive TV (TCL 43" ROKU TV, under $250) since I was a bit skeptical that this cover would really keep my TV dry. I installed the TV outside last week with the A1 cover. We received unusually heavy rains last week in NJ (over 6"). The TV remained perfectly dry. I can't think of a better test for this short of dropping the TV in the pool :). I really appreciate the zippers and velcro strap on the front flap so you don't have to take the cover off each time you watch. I highly reccomend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Feels durable. Easy access for tv viewing and remote pocket.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is exactly what I was looking for. It seals around the tv, has an easily accessible roll up flap to allow quick tv viewing without taking a cover off, and has a remote control pocket. Bingo! The material feels durable and like a plastic canvas type material. There is Velcro closure along the bottom front and sides. The cover looks nice as well. I uploaded pictures of the cover on my 43” television.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Fits 50" Toshiba
customer_reviews.text: Just put this cover on the newly installed 50" Toshiba LED flatscreen we mounted on a tilting and telescoping mount on our terrace. This was the right size for the Toshiba. It's a little baggy but still looks good. Very functional and easy to use. Wrapped the flatscreen, velcroed up the back in about 5 minutes. Really nice the way the front rolls up, almost completely out of the way for viewing. Seems really well made. And between zippers and velcro closures, I'd be surprised if the Toshiba ever gets dusty. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: DId NOT keep my TV dry.
customer_reviews.text: Installed as best I could with the poor directions given. After 1 week went to use the TV but it it fried itself as soon as I tried to turn it on. Turns out it was wet from a rain we had a few days earlier. Sent cover back and got a refund for it. But still no word from them about my broken tv. Don't Buy.
customer_reviews.author: PabloKruise

customer_reviews.title: Pick this over slip on cover
customer_reviews.text: Had originally bought tv cover that u had to slip on/off. Using this for covered patio tv, as the rain still can get on the tv. The slip on cover was extremely difficult to put on and off by yourself, felt like u were going to rip the tv off the wall every time. This one with the roll top is SO SO SO much better and easy to use. It has rained several times and tv has been safe and dry. Highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Mattison

customer_reviews.title: happy TV viewer..
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a 46" but rec'd a 52"...worried this wouldn't work but so far it's been great. I have had a TV outside for years using a traditional cover that you had to take off when you wanted to watch. What makes this so great is you just have to unzip it to watch the TV, we tend to watch TV a few hours at night (usually a game) and this has served that purpose quite well. My TV is set up with hanging plants in the vicinity so the sprinklers do hit the TV cover and so far no issues with any moisture build up.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brownell

customer_reviews.title: Velcro coming off first week.
customer_reviews.text: It's actually a good cover, just don't like the fact that the Velcro is falling off already. Maybe I got a bad one. See attached pic of the Velcro coming off the cover. The front flap is a must if you plan on using the cover regularly. It's very nice just to flip the cover up and not have to deal with putting the whole thing on and off Everytime I watch TV. Fix the Velcro and it's a great cover.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Okay I really do love this thing. Perfect for outdoor protection of our 55 inch tv. The two downfalls that I docked one star off of my rating is because I thought the sides had zippers and Velcro and they don’t. Just the bottom has Velcro. Secondly it’s pretty dang hard to get the thing unzipped and the front part flipped over to uncover it when the top of my tv is 6.5 feet off the ground. This isn’t really the manufacturers fault but I’m not sure what could be changed about the design to help make the easier (pulley string of sorts?). Other than that this is a great item to keep your tv safe from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I'll have to modify it a little for the ceiling hung mount to get all the Velcro to sit flat and completely waterproof it but I knew that when I bought it. It fits well even with the sound bar mounted to the TV which was my biggest concern. Overall I am happy with the quality of the cover, Velcro and zippers. I will update if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT COVER
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cover for a 75" tv. It is a great product, I love it. My only disappointment is that I couldn't get this size in tan, only black. They make a tan tv cover up to 70". The quality and fit is excellent. It's been through one dust storm with 60 mph winds so far (Arizona desert) and it did an excellent job. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV cover
customer_reviews.text: Using this on the TV on my screened porch and it is mounted pretty high. But even if it was mounted low, I do not believe I would ever get the front cover to roll up anywhere as neatly as shown - mine looks more like a bow tie than a sleek roll of material. Other than that, it seems to be doing the job of covering the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Marybarker

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV cover!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous cover. It installed easily even though my mounting bracket is slightly different than what this was designed for. Mostly, I love all the velcro around the bottom so that it can be secured and protected from the elements all around. When using, it is easy to roll up the front and secure it with a velcro strip at the top. It even has clear front corners so that none of the screen is obstructed from view when the cover is rolled up. Great design and seems nice and durable as well. And, the tan is a nice match to my house color. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Tv Cover
customer_reviews.text: This product came timely and in great condition. It fits the tv perfectly as we have a slightly older model of flat screen. The one downside is that it does not properly/fully accommodate a wide flat mount bracket. It seems to be meant for a full motion mount with a smaller mount bracket. Even so, it kept our tv dry during a severe Texas storm with microburst winds that caused rain to blow under covered patio. The role up feature is super convenient. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ACRU

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that you can leave the cover on and just roll up the front to watch TV! It fits my 32 inch TV perfectly! I really like the fact that the sides are zippered instead of Velcro as that makes it easier to roll up the front. If I had one design suggestion, I would recommend that they split the back flap with Velcro on each side that goes around the support to allow better closure around the wall hanger. Otherwise, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent cover fits well with some exceptions
customer_reviews.text: Covered a 50 inZach TLC and it fit great except a little long. Cover was easy to put on and easy to unzip to watch the TV. I live near the ocean so I am concerned how the side zippers will hold up. I wish they had used Velcro instead of zippers which rust in my area. The thing I dislike the most is the way you seal the bottom of the cover. It is Velcro but has been hard for me to get the bottom closure to look uniform and to get all the Velcro to stick.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Keeps TV dry
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a little small but keeps the TV covered up and dry from rain. We have a Roku USB plugged in the back so in the Texas heat, it can get a bit hot and start to overheat (notification pops up on screen) but no worry’s, we just set our garage floor fan tilted to blow on the back of TV! Problem solved. Easy to roll up and Velcro. Does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Good cover.
customer_reviews.text: Cover is thick, canvas like, and has a nice anti-scratch inner liner. It unzips on each side which makes it easy to flip over the backside of the TV when ready to watch it. I cut 4 small slits in the cover so the mount screws will go through it. This allowed the cover to sit flatter on the TV and seal better but it would have worked just fine with the Velcro opening. I just thought it would be better this way especially in winter with snow blowing.
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Look, i don’t normally write reviews, but if I can help anyone out - i will! I did so much searching to find a cover for our Tv that we have on our outdoor deck. We wanted something durable that wouldn’t break the bank so took a chance on this. It’s amazing!! We’ve had so much rain this summer (we live in NJ), and nothing gets inside. They didnt have our size, so we had to go a tad bigger, but it still works! Just is loose when unrolled!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Myers

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several covers for our tv that’s outside on our covered deck. We live in a mild climate, but needed something to keep the rain off if it gets windy during a storm. I was having a hard time deciding which one would work best for us. I decided on this one and it’s working great! It was easy to install and fits fine. We use our tv often, so it’s nice to be able to just unzip the front and roll it up. So far the zippers work well and it seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kim K

customer_reviews.title: Size is Important
customer_reviews.text: While this product appears to be a quality product (and it probably is), it just doesn't fit. I have a 32" flat screen TV so I ordered the 32" cover. Well, if all I had was the 32" screen, it would have covered it nicely.....however, the screen has a plastic bezel around the screen and the cover does not take that into account. It just doesn't fit the TV. It lacks an inch on each side. The next size up is a 40" and that would just overkill.
customer_reviews.author: Olesarge

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV cover & it looks nice. I really wanted the tan cover for our 50” TV but they weren’t available, so I took a chance and bought the smaller size & fits pretty well. I’m happy with this cover and definitely wouldn’t go with a bigger size for our TV. We haven’t had bad weather since we received the cover, but I’m confident that it will protect our outdoor TV
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Despenas

customer_reviews.title: Did exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We got this cover for our 50" Samsung we have on our back lanai. It fit great and easy to put on. I love that we can just open the front and start watching or streaming music. If we had to take a cover on and off all the time, we would never use it. This is perfect...roll up the front and then when we are done, roll it back down and zip it up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Smart design - great cover.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried lots of covers and this one is the first one that seems to “get it”. My thought while putting it on was, “Why aren’t they all designed like this?” The back allows for proper coverage while still allowing for mounting bracket. The fact that the front zips up is great. I’m not sure abt long term durability as I just installed a couple weeks ago, but I’m super impressed to date.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Follow the size guide for a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I followed the sizing instructions to determine the size to order for my tv. It fits like a glove. The side zippers unzip from the bottom up. Keep this in mind if you can’t access the top of your tv from a standing position. After I unzip the sides, I have to use a step stool in order to drape the front half of the cover behind the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D-M

customer_reviews.title: Great all weather flat screen covers that roll up!!
customer_reviews.text: These covers look good and were perfect for my needs. I love the fact that I could just leave them on the whole time and just roll up the front when in use. I like the pocket in the back for the remote as well. They are well made and look like they will last a very long time. Note: my TVs are older so they’re about 3-4” thick so this fits like a glove but this cover may be too big for some of the newer thin screens.
customer_reviews.author: Rx7superman

customer_reviews.title: Measure the top and side not the TV size/diagonal
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, looks great Make sure u order the right size....You don’t need it to be bigger than TV measurement....across the top NOT diagonal.
customer_reviews.author: Billy G

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a "universal cover", this is not for you. This is a cover for someone that has just a universal arm for their TV. We had to make some moderations to make it work on ours, but in the long run, it does seal it up. As far as rolling it to the top...there is a velcro strap, but doesn't strap to anything and you really have to work at rolling it because there is no pole or anything to help with making it easy to roll up. Basically, for a cheap cover, you are getting what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: cajungurl

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but for older TV's
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 43" TCL LCD screen TV. I really do like it but it is very loose fitting. not made for the newer thinner TV's. I like the zippers on the sides but the bottom has a flap the folds under and you have to velcro the bottom closed making it awkward to close the bottom. It would be nice if the bottom had a zipper on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: This a really good cover and the price is great
customer_reviews.text: This a really good cover and the price is great. The material is very durable and it fit my 47" TV perfectly. It has a bottom velcro flap which allows you to seal it on all sides. The zippers on the front face are nice if you don't want to remove the cover every time you watch TV. The only issue I had was securing the flap on the back of the TV at the pivot mount. I had to split the small flap with a scissors to get it to fit around the pivot.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: false advertising when it comes to being waterproof. Took off for the weekend and first rain storm come back to water at the bottom and of screen. Hope tv still works but going to wait till sun is out to let tv dry before attempting to power on.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Protects back well. Loose fit for 60 inch
customer_reviews.text: Rolling up the cover is a pain, just lay the front flap over the back of TV. There are clear corner plastic holds that keep the cover in place. CUT these off as they block part of the viewing screen and the weight of the cover will keep it from coming off anyway. The concept of this cover is good but needs to be size specific for a proper fit and not a general size range.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Double check measurents
customer_reviews.text: Not large enough to completely cover and close a Samsung 65" tv. Thought it was for 65"😏. Anyway,I kept it because it at least covers the side that is more exposed to the elements. I have my tv under a completely covered patio,so very rarely would the rain be able to get close to the tv..
customer_reviews.author: betternbtr

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, fair price
customer_reviews.text: I used this to cover a small outdoor TV under a gazebo. We have only had it for a short while, but so far so good. Went on easily, looks nice, and I especially like the flap can just be rolled up and roll down so that the cover doesn’t need to be removed each time. The order was sent quickly and was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is nice but...
customer_reviews.text: The cover fit my 55in tv very well. However, my mount is different from the one shown on the pictures. I have hooks that screw in the back of my tv along with a rubber back stopper that screws on the bottom on the back of my tv. So, I had to cut small tears that lined up to the open screw slots in order for my mount to work. Other than that it is a nice product, especially that the front flat rolls up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Wise

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my TV located on my covered deck. It works great as we had some heavy winds and rain and my TV was bone dry. I ordered mine by measuring the dimensions of the actual TV not the diagonal then went off of the size chart. It fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Demaree H.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and does a great job of keeping water away from TV
customer_reviews.text: Really like the fact that this cover has zippers on the side and then velcro on the bottom to enclose the TV. It is easy to put on, very easy to roll up when watching and again very simple to close when needed. No issue yet with any rain getting into the TV enclossure
customer_reviews.author: Frank Villani

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I resisted buying one of these because my tv is in a California room so not exposed to terrible elements given I am in So Cal. However the sun hits it at certain times of the year and it’s not good for the tv. I am so impressed by the construction and function of this cover. It is so well designed, easy to place, storage for the remote and you don’t have to take it off to watch tv. You can just roll up the front and rest it over the back of the tv. I don’t write a lot of reviews but this product exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this cover. I was looking for one that you didn't have to take completely off to view the TV and this was it. If you want more of a 'fit' measure well, and account for slim sides. Mine fits perfect. And the color almost matches my outdoor wall perfectly. It is well made and durable and even has a pocket on the back for the TV remote. I love cover!
customer_reviews.author: Leisa

customer_reviews.title: Best TV cover I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This cover seems to be well made and is very easy to use. Being able to leave the cover in place and just open the front flap to watch TV. Two side zippers and I just flip the cover over the top. Much easier than my old cover that had to be completely removed. It is too soon to comment on the durability so we'll see. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: bvanbower

customer_reviews.title: Works and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Fits great especially on the older (thicker) TVs. It Maybe a little loose on the super thin ones, not sure. Easy to install and the front flap rolls up and secures with Velcro scrap for quick viewing. Sides zipper. Bottom Velcro’s. Back has velcroed flaps for securing around brackets so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: K-Nuts18

customer_reviews.title: Suggestions
customer_reviews.text: My TV is mounted to a post on my covered deck which leaves the TV back exposed to the weather. The cover was a good fit and my only complaint was that I had to split the upper back flap to get around the TV mount post. Just a suggestion that it might be easier to seal the bottom if you could make the back longer so it wraps to the front instead of front cover wrapping to back. So far I think it is a very nice cover and seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: LAH

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor TV cover!
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for the perfect outdoor TV cover and this is the one! Price is great and it is VERY great quality. The sides open so you can roll front side up while viewing...perfect to protect your investment.
customer_reviews.author: silvia

customer_reviews.title: Easy install & very durable AND easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use - no more removing the ENTIRE thing to watch TV - that is the BEST part! TV is nice and dry all through the rainy winter. AND my tv is not under a completely dry roof, just the eave so rain did get on the cover. But not a bit of damage to my TV. I have already recommended it to my family. Highly reccommended! And I don't normally leave reviews unless the product is horrible or super amazing. This one is SUPER AMAZING. Don't pass it up
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Alley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you don't want the hassle of taking a cover on and off
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I have been looking for! I wanted a TV cover that I could leave on without having to constantly take it on and off, and this works perfect. It's really not even necessary to roll up the cover. Instead, I just fold it over so that it hands over the back of the TV, and you can't even see it from the front side. Great product and has kept our TV dry.
customer_reviews.author: M. LeighTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This item was just what I looking for. The quality is good and the material is durable. It has held up against rain and wind. This item is perfect for protecting your tv.
customer_reviews.author: DKD

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable tv cover......
customer_reviews.text: Right off the get go I really enjoyed the well made material of this tv cover. I'm not planning on using it for outdoor purposes. I want to protect my tv from dust and outside factors. Plus, when I use my projector, it is nice to have my tv covered so that light doesn't show through projector cloth. I recommend this item to anyone who values what they buy and want to take care of their products.
customer_reviews.author: JESUS A BURCIAGA

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Cover and definitely worth to spend the extra $ for a quality cover. Fits my 55" ROKU perfectly. I would recommend cutting off the clear plastic corners as I think it obstructs from the view. The cover is very sturdy so during watching I find it easiest to flip the entire cover over the back without having to roll it up and attach Velcro, plus it just makes viewing easier that way and gives the TV viewing a more finished look
customer_reviews.author: Craig Stork

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. Easy setup. Velcro along the bottom is difficult to attach evenly across to seal completely. Otherwise works well. Pocket for remotes is nice but don't think wise to leave them outside in case heat causes battery issues. Lost a remote from battery leak from heat since had worked for a while indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cover Did Not Fit Well
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice TV cover, however it was at least twice as deep as the depth of the TV. So it fit baggy. This was used on a Vizio 50" 1080 TV from Costco. If it fit better I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed to ensure the outdoor TV was protected.
customer_reviews.text: The cover appears to be well made and was easy to install on our outdoor TV. It has stayed put through numerous Indiana summer rain storms and gusty winds. The front cover zips down and Velcro fasteners give some extra security. Birds were not interested in getting under the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Denise A. Gowan

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: This year we decided to put a 55" t.v outside. We have a open deck with a roof . We love are cover it was super easy to install. And worked well even when we had rain with high winds . Easy to open and close when you want to watch the t.v
customer_reviews.author: crystal naill

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove on my 55" Roku tv.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to keep my new TV safe from the elements. I'm glad I picked this one with the roll up capabilities. This way I protect the sides and back all the time and when I go away or I know bad weather is heading my way, I just roll the front cover down. Simple and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jon DeMott

customer_reviews.title: Best option
customer_reviews.text: This unit was the solution for protection for my 50in flat screen on my porch. I had looked at several of these types of units but none of them were as well made or as easily utilize, and easily stowed away once we were done as this one

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric & look, but won’t go around mounting arm
customer_reviews.text: So I’m a bit confused. The fabric and make up of this looks great, but when you have the TV on a mount outside there is just a Velcro flap. It would work great, but it has no chance of closing with the mount off the back. So now there is just a big hole in back of TV with no coverage from weather and a big flap that can’t go over the mounting arm, major flaw I feel that will probably make me return.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Price right!
customer_reviews.text: Quality of material is decent. Seems to be holding up well on my patio. My tv is a 40 inch, only about 3 inches in thickness. The cover has a lot of slack. But it is function-able and price right! I would purchase again, maybe go down a size in the cover.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Austin

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Cover for Roku 40 inch Flat Screen
customer_reviews.text: Well made, thick material with side zipper closure and Velcro bottom. I placed mine on a Roku 40 inch flat screen. My TV is on legs and the only shortcoming is that there are no slots in cover to fit around legs, but if it was a wall mount it would provide complete coverages. The cover is designed to fit thicker screens, so there is some looseness.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: The future of TV covers... must have
customer_reviews.text: I use to have the pull over and pull off cover which was a hassle at times. This flip cover for my 75 inch flat screen makes life easy. Very stylish to match a very nice TV. Protect your investment with this, it does everything the seller describes.
customer_reviews.author: Hard Worker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Idea
customer_reviews.text: Used to cover outdoor Lanai 32” smart TV. On wall. The zipper front is excellent. Cover stays on while front unzippers and just roll it up and adhere to Velcro. Great idea and works excellent.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wahoo

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover the back of your tv.
customer_reviews.text: Unless, your tv mount comes up from the bottom to attach to your tv, this cover will not adequately cover the back of your tv. So, this will not work with the majority of tv mounts.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: I love my outdoor television cover. I love the fact that you can just unzip the front and roll it up instead of removing the entire cover. At first i thought i bought a size too small but it was actually a perfect fit. Very satisfied !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. We like the fact that we don’t have to remove the cover every time we watch tv & replace it. Just unzip & roll up the front cover & you’re good to go!! Would buy again. It fits great, too.
customer_reviews.author: vcs5199

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well made and keeps tv dry even in a rain storm! Easy to open and close and velcro adds extra protection. Protective pocket for remote control is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Buczkowski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cover!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 50 inch Vizio perfectly. Works great with the table stand I have the TV on. Love the zippers, so much easier than taking the whole cover off like some of the other covers I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Alberts

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our 65” outside tv. It works well, we don’t have severe winters here but a lot of rain. This tv cover has worked well for us. Looks nice and keeps tv dry. Our tv is on a covered back patio but between humidity and wind and rain we needed a good tv cover and this works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney duhone

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover is great fits well and is very well made. Only negative is that it is hard if you want to velcro the bottom. Doesn't bother me as I just tuck the front under the legs of my tv. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for our outside TV. Works great. Easy to fit. Allows us to view the entire screen. With the height of our TV it is a bit difficult for my wife to flip the cover, but she leaves that for me to do so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ehmer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cover for an outdoor tv!
customer_reviews.text: The cover has plenty of room to go around the tv and tv mount. I have a small satellite box that I have velcro'd to the back of the tv and it fits with the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Mischelle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a little cheapie 32" HD TV to go on our deck and obviously wanted to shield it from the elements. I bought one cover with no front flap/zipper and sent it back and then bought this one. Wow! It fits perfectly with no sagging. The flaps are great on the back to get the mount situated. The zip up front is amazing for use and then just let down when finished. Five star product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you order the right size
customer_reviews.text: It's a good item but I wish you came in more sizes. I ordered a size too small for my TV. I have this on a 48" TV. The Velcro is strong the pouch in the back is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Michael2756

customer_reviews.title: Not Water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Not water resistant, so cover your TV if start to rain
customer_reviews.author: Naty

customer_reviews.title: great design, use it outside under covered porch and ...
customer_reviews.text: great design, use it outside under covered porch and last week the wind blew the rain into the covered area. the cover protected the TV without any problems. So glad to have it, I just put the TV up last month and it would have been bad to have the wind blown rain all over the screen of my LG!
customer_reviews.author: William L.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with our purchase of this cover, fits our tv and covers it very nicely. Very good material quality and I like that you can roll up the front and leave the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Ima Byer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cover for an older Sunbrite model tv we inherited with our new home. We chose this cover b/c of the round back opening to accommodate our old style mount and the tan color. It works perfectly! The cover is great quality, & we’ve had multiple rainy days/nights to test that. I would highly recommend this brand. As a plus, it ships incredibly fast.
customer_reviews.author: Staci P.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, quality material.  Good investment for the money
customer_reviews.text: This cover is wonderful. Out lani TV aka outdoor living room has direct sunlight in the mornings and this protects the screen from the heat as well as the humidity. With a convenient pocket for the remote control. All we have to do now is consistently remember to put the remote in it's pocket LOL:} Good investment for the money
customer_reviews.author: Charles S

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: This was the second outdoor tv cover I purchased. The first one did not have the ability for the front cover to roll up and secure at the top. You had to just throw it over the back and it didn’t always stay so I returned it and ordered this one. This one is fits much better.
customer_reviews.author: AMYMDR

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Great service
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all- great coverage and shipped quickly and securely. Thank you such great service !!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit all mounts!
customer_reviews.text: It works okay. It does not fit most mounts. As you can see by my photo. I had to cut a hole in the flap and reinforce it with Gorilla tape. I hope it holds up. Other than that it looks and works okay.
customer_reviews.author: David L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a replacement for a different tv cover that ripped after a few years. This cover is wonderful. The old would have to be removed and then placed somewhere while watching TV and then put back on, it was always a hassle. This new cover front unzips and rolls over the top. A matter of seconds. Way better.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my tv
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model Sharp Aquos. It was wide enough to cover the full tv. I had to order 1 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cover my 32" TV under my gazebo and so far so good. It keeps out the rain and is so easy open and close for use. This is a great product and i would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product-protects perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The first cover I purchased slide over the TV which did not work well for my set up. I have a ceiling motorized TV mount-the cover was a perfect fit...albeit I need to get on a ladder to roll up the front cover... everything else about this TV cover is spot on...recently had a rain and wind storm and the cover passed the first test. I will recommend this cover to my friend-I bet it will work perfectly on a wall mount TV.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 65in Tv and it looks very well made and durable. It was very easy to put on and unzip when your watching tv. So far very pleased with the purchase would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Lisboa

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my outdoor 48in. TV and it fits perfectly! It's easy to put on and it keeps everything dry and protected from the outdoor elements. I could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought several other tv covers in the past. Most are the type you would have to cover your tv by draping a simi waterproof bag over. That is a pain but this one is different you leave the tv covered and before use all you do is unzip the sides roll the front up and that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: Billy O.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Keeps dust out.  Fit was a little big for my set.
customer_reviews.text: This cover works well and keeps the dust out. It is a bit too big. And was easier to install that I thought, but I have to remove it everytime I need to install a cable to an input. Never had issue with overhrating even in the Phoenix summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: J Hice

customer_reviews.title: Buy the cheaper one without the flap
customer_reviews.text: It is a good cover but the flap that unzips and rolls back it ant worth it as the whole thing has to be taken off because it fits rather loosely on a thinner LED TV. Save a few bucks and buy the cheaper one that slides on and off and be done with it.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: LOOK NO FURTHER!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying, and I definitely made the right choice. Our TV is outdoor but underroof; but I still wanted to protect it from dust, bugs, etc. It's really sharp, and fits my 43" TV perfectly! And I especially love the fact that we don't have to take it off every time we use it, but instead we can just roll the front panel up and back down when we're finished watching TV. I've never written a product review, but I had to for this. I HIGHLY recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Hennon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! That said, our TV is fairly sheltered outside, so I’m not sure how well it stands up to direct rain. When we watch TV we simply roll up the top and stuff it behind the back of the TV. No issues with the TV overheating in the middle of 90° weather
customer_reviews.author: Vman

customer_reviews.title: A1 tv outside cover
customer_reviews.text: Order was promptly delivered and fits perfectly!! Love the softer fabric on inside of tv cover! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lavetta Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Great for TV on stand
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our patio TV that has not yet been mounted. It fits around the bottom of the TV sitting on the stand. It’s not a tight fit but works! TV measures 47” wide.
customer_reviews.author: MimiNina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Installed great overall existing television for outside in the screen room. Seems to be keeping any damage away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roll up front is super convenient
customer_reviews.text: Got the cover in the day after the TV was mounted. Fits our 65" great. Has about 4" of extra on the bottom, but that's not a big deal. Really like the Velcro closures and zippered front as well at the remote control pocket. Roll up front seems much easier than removing the cover for each use. Exactly what we expected and happy we ordered this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does what description says
customer_reviews.text: It does everything we need for our tv in our outdoor living space. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa l Kruft

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on 65 inch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and fits almost perfect on our 65 inch TV. We are just using this as a cover for indoors at work, but it is made for use outdoors. Great buy at a very reasonable price in comparison to others on Amazon. Good and study material with a flip front. Given the "flip-front" which can be velcroed once rolled up - you do not actually have to remove the entire cover to look at the TV. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice!
customer_reviews.text: We are completely happy with this TV cover. We wanted something we didn't have to take off everytime we used the TV and this is it. The cover fit our 32inch TV perfectly and the folding front opening is super convenient. We just ordered a second cover without hesitation for our 43inch outdoor TV. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have an outside TV on our 3rd floor condo balcony and covered it in towels for 3 years! Found this, bought it and love it! Covers the TV and the cable box and has enough room so the cable box vents and doesn't over heat. Love the ability to roll the cover back and watch TV easily. Well protected and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Craig

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly very well made for the money. Only flaw is no way to close around a mount so it’s penetrable by rain behind the tv. Remote pocket is pretty impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T.

customer_reviews.title: It survived Hurricane Laura and Delta!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go over my 50" TCL Roku TV that stays on my back patio. The TV is hung under the eve of the house, but does not have a cover over the patio. It fits perfectly and was easy to install. More importantly, it gets the job done and protects the TV like a champ. It survived Hurricane Laura and Delta with ease. I HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it from weather
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 55” perfectly and has place for remote. Covers tv from weather
customer_reviews.author: bernard j. siler jr.
